name: Speed Shooter
description:
The objective of this game is to shoot as many obstacles that come in your way as possible, BUT you do NOT was to get hit by these obstacles otherwise your points will reset!!! The mechanics in controlling you player is difficult on purpose muwahah!!!

Direction keys: W(up) A(left) S(down) D (right)

Shoot: J, K, or L

MAKE YOUR SCREEN SIZE FULL FOR MAXIMUM EXPERIENCE!!!!!
